column1: S192B.CARD.  1. CARD ONE
S192B.DECK.  192. SURVEY NUMBER
S192B.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.
S192B.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR PRESENT RAN?  1. SECOND LIEUTENANT 2. FIRST LIEUTENANT 3. CAPTAIN 4. MAJOR

S192B.Q2. DO YOU THINK A NURSE WITH ABILITY HAS A GOOD CHANCE FOR PROMOTION IN THE ARM?  1. A VERY GOOD CHANCE 2. A FAIRLY GOOD CHANCE 3. NOT MUCH OF A CHANCE 4. NO CHANCE AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S192B.Q3. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDA?  1. 22 YEARS 2. 23 3. 24 4. 25 5. 26-29 YEARS 6. 30-34 YEARS 7. 35 YEARS AND OVER 0. NO ANSWER

S192B.Q4. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOO?  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER
S192B.Q5. ARE YOU:  1. SINGLE 2. MARRIED 3. DIVORCED OR SEPARATED 4. WIDOWED
S192B.Q6. WERE YOU MARRIED BEFORE OR AFTER ENTERING THE ARM?  1. MARRIED BEFORE ENTERING THE ARMY 2. MARRIED AFTER ENTERING THE ARMY 3. I'M NOT MARRIED
S192B.Q7. HOW MANY CHILDREN DO YOU HAV?  1. HAVE ONE CHILD 2. HAVE TWO CHILDREN 3. HAVE THREE OR MORE CHILDREN 4. HAVE NO CHILDREN 5. I'M NOT MARRIED
S192B.Q8A. DO YOU APPROVE OR DISAPPROVE OF THIS POLIC?  1. I APPROVE OF THIS POLICY 2. I DISAPPROVE OF THIS POLICY 0. NO ANSWER

S192B.Q8B. IF THE PRESENT POLICY PROHIBITING MARRIAGE WERE TO BE CHANGED TO PERMIT A NURSE TO MARRY WHILE IN THE INDIA- BURMA THEATER DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD GET MARRIED DURING THE TIME YOU ARE GOING TO BE OVER HER?  1. YES, I'M SURE I'D GET MARRIED OVER HERE 2. NO, I WOULD NOT GET MARRIED OVER HERE 3. I MIGHT, BUT I'M NOT SURE 4. I AM ALREADY MARRIED

S192B.Q9. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE ARM?  1. 6 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 3. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 4. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 5. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO 3 YEARS 6. OVER 3 YEARS

S192B.Q10. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE INDIA-BURMA THEATE?  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 4. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 5. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 18 MONTHS 6. OVER 18 MONTHS UP TO 2 YEARS 7. OVER 2 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S192B.Q11. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN STATIONED AT THIS PARTICULAR PLAC?  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 4. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 5. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 18 MONTHS 6. OVER 18 MONTHS UP TO 2 YEARS 7. OVER 2 YEARS
S192B.Q12. IN GENERAL, HOW WELL DO YOU THINK THE ARMY IS RU?  1. IT IS RUN VERY WELL 2. IT IS RUN PRETTY WELL 3. IT IS NOT RUN SO WELL 4. IT IS RUN VERY POORLY 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S192B.Q13. IN YOUR OPINION, HOW IMPORTANT IS THE JOB OF THE ARMY NURSE CORPS IN WINNING THE WA?  1. VERY IMPORTANT 2. PRETTY IMPORTANT 3. NOT SO IMPORTANT 4. NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S192B.Q14. WHAT IS YOUR MAIN ARMY JOB NO?  1. ADMINISTRATIVE WORK 2. GENERAL NURSING WORK 3. DIETICIAN WORK 4. PHYSIOTHERAPY WORK 0. NO ANSWER
S192B.Q15. DO YOU FEEL PROUD OF YOUR PRESENT JOB OR DUT?  1. YES, VERY PROUD 2. YES, FAIRLY PROUD 3. NO, NOT PROUD 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S192B.Q16. HOW INTERESTED ARE YOU IN YOUR ARMY JO?  1. VERY MUCH INTERESTED 2. A LITTLE BUT NOT MUCH 3. NOT INTERESTED AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S192B.Q17. HOW MUCH OF YOUR DUTY TIME IS USED IN DOING THINGS THAT DO NOT SEEM IMPORTANT TO YO?  1. A LOT OF IT 2. SOME OF IT 3. ONLY A LITTLE OF IT 4. NONE OF IT

S192B.Q18. DO YOU CONSIDER YOUR OWN PRESENT JOB OR DUTY IN THE ARMY AN IMPORTANT ONE IN THE WAR EFFOR?  1. VERY IMPORTANT 2. PRETTY IMPORTANT 3. NOT SO IMPORTANT 4. NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S192B.Q19. DO YOU THINK THE COMMANDING OFFICER OF YOUR HOSPITAL UNIT CONSIDERS YOUR JOB AN IMPORTANT ONE IN THE WAR EFFOR?  1. YES, HE CONSIDERS IT IMPORTANT 2. NO, HE DOES NOT CONSIDER IT IMPORTANT 3. I HAVE NO IDEA WHETHER OR NOT HE CONSIDERS IT IMPORTANT 0. NO ANSWER
S192B.Q20. DO YOU USUALLY FEEL THAT WHAT YOU ARE DOING IN THE ARMY IS WORTHWHILE OR NO?  1. I USUALLY FEEL IT IS WORTHWHILE 2. I USUALLY FEEL IT IS NOT WORTHWHILE 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S192B.Q21. DO YOU THINK YOU ARE MAKING GOOD IN THE ARM?  1. I FEEL PRETTY SURE I AM MAKING GOOD 2. I AM NOT SO SURE I AM MAKING GOOD 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S192B.Q22. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF A TIME DO YOU HAVE IN THE ARM?  1. I HAVE A PRETTY GOOD TIME 2. IT'S ABOUT FIFTY-FIFTY 3. I HAVE A PRETTY ROTTEN TIME 0. NO ANSWER

S192B.Q23. DO YOU EVER FEEL THAT YOU ARE NOT AS GOOD A NURSE AS MOST OF THE OTHER NURSES IN YOUR HOSPITAL UNI?  1. I FEEL THAT WAY NEARLY ALL OF THE TIME 2. I FEEL THAT WAY FAIRLY OFTEN 3. I FEEL THAT WAY ONLY ONCE IN A WHILE 4. I ALMOST NEVER FEEL THAT WAY 0. NO ANSWER

S192B.Q24. IN GENERAL, WOULD YOU SAY YOU ARE WELL ADJUSTED OR POORLY ADJUSTED TO ARMY LIF?  1. I AM VERY WELL ADJUSTED 2. I AM FAIRLY WELL ADJUSTED 3. I AM NOT SO WELL ADJUSTED 4. I AM VERY POORLY ADJUSTED 0. NO ANSWER
S192B.Q25. DO YOU FEEL PROUD OF YOUR HOSPITAL UNI?  1. YES, VERY PROUD 2. YES, FAIRLY PROUD 3. NO, NOT PROUD 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S192B.Q26. DO YOU CONSIDER THE JOB YOUR HOSPITAL UNIT IS DOING AN IMPORTANT ONE IN THE WAR EFFOR?  1. VERY IMPORTANT 2. PRETTY IMPORTANT 3. NOT SO IMPORTANT 4. NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S192B.Q27. IN DOING YOUR JOB, HOW MUCH SUPERVISION DO YOU GET FROM YOUR NURSE SUPERVISO?  1. TOO MUCH SUPERVISION 2. ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT 3. TOO LITTLE SUPERVISION 0. NO ANSWER
S192B.Q28. DO YOU FEEL THAT THE CHIEF NURSE WHO IS IN CHARGE OF YOUR WORK REALLY KNOWS HER STUF?  1. YES 2. NO 3. I DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER

S192B.Q29. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOUR CHIEF NURSE HAS AN INTEREST IN YOUR PERSONAL PROBLEMS AND WELFAR?  1. SHE HAS A GREAT DEAL OF INTEREST 2. SHE HAS A FAIR AMOUNT OF INTEREST 3. SHE DOESN'T HAVE MUCH INTEREST 4. SHE HAS NO INTEREST AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S192B.Q30. IF YOU NEEDED ADVICE ON A PERSONAL PROBLEM, WOULD YOU FEEL FREE TO GO TO THE CHIEF NURSE AND DISCUSS I?  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER
S192B.Q31. IN YOUR HOSPITAL UNIT DO THE MOST DESERVING NURSES USUALLY GET THE BREAK?  1. ALMOST ALWAYS 2. MOST OF THE TIME 3. ABOUT HALF OF THE TIME 4. PRETTY SELDOM 5. ALMOST NEVER 0. NO ANSWER

S192B.Q32A. HOW ABOUT THE MESS FOR THE NURSES AT YOUR HOSPITAL UNI? IS IT AS GOOD AS IT COULD BE UNDER PRESENT CIRCUMSTANCE?  1. YES, AS GOOD AS IT COULD BE 2. NO, NOT AS GOOD AS IT COULD BE 3. UNDECIDED
S192B.Q32B. CONSIDERING EVERYTHING HOW GOOD IS THE MAIL SERVICE YOUR HOSPITAL IS GETTIN?  1. VERY GOOD 2. PRETTY GOOD 3. NOT SO GOOD 4. POOR

S192B.Q33. DO YOU THINK YOUR HOSPITAL UNIT HAS TOO MANY NURSES, ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT, OR TOO FEW NURSES TO ACCOMPLISH ITS MISSION SUCCESSFULL?  1. TOO MANY NURSES 2. ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT 3. TOO FEW NURSES 0. NO ANSWER

S192B.Q34. IN GENERAL DO THE NURSES IN YOUR HOSPITAL UNIT HAVE TOO MUCH OFF-DUTY FREE TIME, ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT, OR TOO LITTLE OFF-DUTY FREE TIM?  1. TOO MUCH 2. ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT 3. TOO LITTLE 0. NO ANSWER

S192B.Q35. SINCE YOU HAVE BEEN WITH THIS HOSPITAL UNIT HAVE YOU BEEN ABLE TO FIND INTERESTING THINGS TO DO ON YOUR OFF-DUTY FREE TIM?  1. I CAN USUALLY FIND INTERESTING THINGS TO DO 2. I CAN FIND INTERESTING THINGS TO DO ABOUT HALF OF THE TIME 3. I CAN VERY SELDOM FIND INTERESTING THINGS TO DO 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 36 NOT CODED.
S192B.Q37. DO THE NURSES IN YOUR HOSPITAL UNIT COOPERATE, AND WORK WELL TOGETHE?  1. ALL OF THE TIME 2. MOST OF THE TIME 3. OFTEN DO NOT 4. ALMOST NEVER DO 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S192B.Q38. HOW MANY OF THE NURSES IN YOUR HOSPITAL UNIT WOULD YOU SAY ARE GOOD ALL-AROUND NURSE?  1. ALL ARE 2. MOST ARE 3. ABOUT HALF ARE, HALF ARE NOT 4. ONLY A FEW ARE 5. ALMOST NONE ARE 0. NO ANSWER
S192B.Q39. DO YOU LIKE TO WORK WITH THE OTHER NURSES IN YOUR HOSPITAL UNI?  1. WITH MOST OF THEM 2. WITH ABOUT HALF OF THEM 3. WITH ONLY A FEW OF THEM 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S192B.Q40A. WOULD YOU SAY THAT MOST OF THE NURSES IN YOUR HOSPITAL UNIT USUALLY PUT ALL THEY HAVE INTO THEIR ARMY DUTIES, OR DO THEY USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET B?  1. MOST OF THE NURSES USUALLY PUT ALL THEY HAVE INTO IT 2. MOST OF THE NURSES USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET BY 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S192B.Q40B. HOW ABOUT YOU YOURSELF - WOULD YOU HONESTLY SAY THAT YOU USUALLY PUT ALL YOU HAVE INTO YOUR ARMY NURSING DUTIES, OR DO YOU USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET B?  1. I USUALLY PUT ALL I HAVE INTO IT 2. I USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET BY 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S192B.Q41. IN GENERAL, HOW WOULD YOU SAY YOU FEEL MOST OF THE TIME, IN GOOD SPIRITS OR IN LOW SPIRIT?  1. I AM USUALLY IN GOOD SPIRITS 2. I AM IN GOOD SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME AND IN LOW SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME 3. I AM USUALLY IN LOW SPIRITS
S192B.Q42. ARE YOU EVER WORRIED AND UPSE?  1. I AM HARDLY EVER WORRIED AND UPSET 2. I AM SOMETIMES WORRIED AND UPSET 3. I AM OFTEN WORRIED AND UPSET

S192B.Q43. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU, WHAT KIND OF AN ARMY HOSPITAL UNIT WOULD YOU RATHER BE I?  1. IN A HOSPITAL UNIT NEAR A FIGHTING FRONT 2. IN A HOSPITAL UNIT IN A NON-COMBAT AREA OVERSEAS 3. IN A HOSPITAL UNIT STATIONED IN THE UNITED STATES 0. NO ANSWER

S192B.Q44. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU TO CHOOSE, DO YOU THINK YOU COULD DO MORE FOR YOUR COUNTRY AS A NURSE IN THE ARMY, OR AS A NURSE IN A CIVILIAN HOSPITAL IN THE UNITED STATES, OR AS A WORKER IN A WAR JO?  1. NURSE IN THE ARMY 2. NURSE IN A CIVILIAN HOSPITAL 3. A WORKER IN A WAR JOB 0. NO ANSWER
S192B.Q45. WHEN YOU GET A VERY IMPORTANT JOB TO DO, DO YOU WORRY ABOUT WHETHER YOU WILL DO ALL RIGHT OR NO?  1. I WORRY A LOT 2. I WORRY A LITTLE 3. I DON'T WORRY AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S192B.Q46. SUPPOSE YOU WERE WORKING AT YOUR REGULAR JOB AND A DIRECTOR OF NURSES YOU HAD NEVER SEEN BEFORE CAME UP AND ASKED YOU QUESTIONS ABOUT WHAT YOU WERE DOING. DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD MAKE A GOOD IMPRESSION ON HE?  1. I'M PRETTY SURE I WOULD MAKE A GOOD IMPRESSION ON HER 2. I'M NOT SURE, BUT I THINK I WOULD MAKE A GOOD IMPRESSION ON HER 3. I DON'T THINK I WOULD MAKE SUCH A GOOD IMPRESSION ON HER 0. NO ANSWER

S192B.Q47. DO TOO MANY OF THE ARMY RULES AND REGULATIONS SEEM USELESS TO YO?  1. YES, TOO MANY SEEM USELESS 2. NO, I USED TO THINK SO BUT I DON'T THINK SO NOW 3. NO, I NEVER THOUGHT SO 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S192B.Q48. HOW IMPORTANT IS IT TO YOU PERSONALLY TO MAKE A GOOD RECORD IN THE ARM?  1. IT IS VERY IMPORTANT 2. IT IS PRETTY IMPORTANT 3. IT IS NOT SO IMPORTANT 4. IT IS NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S192B.Q49. HOW WOULD YOU RATE YOUR GENERAL PHYSICAL CONDITION DURING THE PAST MONT?  1. MY PHYSICAL CONDITION HAS BEEN VERY GOOD 2. MY PHYSICAL CONDITION HAS BEEN PRETTY GOOD 3. MY PHYSICAL CONDITION HAS NOT BEEN SO GOOD 4. MY PHYSICAL CONDITION HAS BEEN VERY POOR
S192B.Q50A. FINANCIAL MATTER?  1. I WORRY ABOUT IT A LOT 2. I WORRY ABOUT IT SOMEWHAT 3. I DON'T WORRY ABOUT IT AT ALL
S192B.Q50B. MY HEALT?  1. I WORRY ABOUT IT A LOT 2. I WORRY ABOUT IT SOMEWHAT 3. I DON'T WORRY ABOUT IT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S192B.Q50C. THE PROGRESS OF THE WA?  1. I WORRY ABOUT IT A LOT 2. I WORRY ABOUT IT SOMEWHAT 3. I DON'T WORRY ABOUT IT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S192B.Q50D. MY SOCIAL LIFE  1. I WORRY ABOUT IT A LOT 2. I WORRY ABOUT IT SOMEWHAT 3. I DON'T WORRY ABOUT IT AT ALL
S192B.Q50E. MATTERS CONCERNING MY FAMILY AND FRIENDS BACK HOM?  1. I WORRY ABOUT IT A LOT 2. I WORRY ABOUT IT SOMEWHAT 3. I DON'T WORRY ABOUT IT AT ALL
S192B.Q50F. THE WAY I AM GETTING ALONG IN THE ARM?  1. I WORRY ABOUT IT A LOT 2. I WORRY ABOUT IT SOMEWHAT 3. I DON'T WORRY ABOUT IT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S192B.Q50G. NOT KNOWING WHAT IS GOING TO HAPPEN TO ME NEXT IN MY ARMY CAREE?  1. I WORRY ABOUT IT A LOT 2. I WORRY ABOUT IT SOMEWHAT 3. I DON'T WORRY ABOUT IT AT ALL
S192B.Q50H. PURELY PERSONAL MATTERS NOT INCLUDED IN ANY OF THE ABOV?  1. I WORRY ABOUT IT A LOT 2. I WORRY ABOUT IT SOMEWHAT 3. I DON'T WORRY ABOUT IT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 51 NOT CODED.

S192B.Q52. UP TO NOW, HAS THE WAR MADE THINGS BETTER OR WORSE FOR YOUR FAMILY AND FRIENDS BACK HOME (SUCH THINGS AS JOBS, PAY, AND LIVING CONDITIONS)*  1. THINGS ARE A LOT BETTER 2. THINGS ARE A LITTLE BETTER, BUT NOT MUCH 3. THINGS ARE A LOT WORSE 4. THINGS ARE A LITTLE WORSE 5. I DON'T SEE ANY DIFFERENCE 6. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 53 NOT CODED.

S192B.V54. IDENTIFICATION OF HOSPITALS:  1. 142ND GENERAL HOSPITAL - WHICH HAD ONE OF THE LARGEST CONCENTRATIONS OF NURSE PERSONNEL IN THE THEATER 2. 20TH GENERAL HOSPITAL - ALSO HAD ONE OF THE LARGEST CONCENTRATIONS OF NURSE PERSONNEL IN THE THEATER 3. 69TH GENERAL HOSPITAL - A SMALL HOSPITAL 4. 14TH EVACUATION HOSPITAL 5. 48TH EVACUATION HOSPITAL
S192B.V55. SERIAL NUMBERING WITHIN EACH HOSPITAL:  ANP X. CODES NOT PROVIDED BY SURVEY ORGANIZATION. DATA TRANSFERRED AS IS.
